blog.name: love-howard-potts-3000
blog.title: It's About Legacy, and What We Choose Leave Behind
blog.description: Tony Stark left behind a legacy. Not just in his universe, but ours as well. Sometimes I write about him and that legacy on Ao3

summary:
Me: *after IW* Tony is going to die this time next year :( :( :(
Me: *further into summer* he is going to die omg no.
Me: *After...
body:
Me: *after IW* Tony is going to die this time next year :( :( :(

Me: *further into summer* he is going to die omg no.

Me: *After the first trailer* shit he’s going to die.

Me: *after the second trailer* oh damn. he dead.

Me: *after the rain of tv spots* fuck. he’s going to fucking die.

Me: *after RDJ cried at the press tour* Fuck. Tony is going to fucking die. Fucking fuck.

Me: *sitting in the theater* FUCKING FUCK!!! HE’S FUCKING GOING TO FUCKING DIE. FUCKING FUCKETY FUCK.

Tony: *dies*

Me:

(This has probably already been done, but I did my own version)

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Вымощена Благими Намерениями
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IOt4Hk

by dnimreven

Когда в руки таинственной группе наемных убийц, известной как ‘Мстители’, попала наводка на грязные секреты Старк Индастрис, Стив Роджерс всей душой и сердцем нацелился вывести Тони Старка из игры раз и навсегда, чтобы защитить мир от его зла. Он ведь видел в хронике… Старк - это человек, который сражается только за себя. И, естественно, когда на горизонте появилась возможность стать личным телохранителем Старка, чтобы защищать его от увеличивающихся угроз со стороны слишком настойчивого преследователя, Стив просто не смог ею не воспользоваться. Должность идеально ему подходила, с ее помощью он сможет выяснить, является ли наводка правдивой.
Однако, принимая на себя обязанности телохранителя мистера Старка и проводя с ним всё больше времени, узнавая и защищая его, вся изначальная ненависть начинает изменяться и превращаться в нечто иное. В нечто гораздо более пугающее, чем перспектива убить главное лицо Старк Индастрис.
Вместо этого Стив Роджерс начинает в него влюбляться.

Words: 11625, Chapters: 1/15, Language: Русский

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Peggy Carter, James “Bucky” Barnes
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - No Powers, Pre-Iron Man 1, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Enemies to Friends to Lovers, Assassins & Hitmen, Hurt Steve Rogers, Hurt Tony Stark, Secret Identity, Hurt/Comfort, Angst, Angst with a Happy Ending, Misunderstandings And Bad First Impressions, Falling In Love, Перевод на русский | Translation in Russian


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IOt4Hk

body:
3,500 Followers Celebration!!

First, I would just like to say thank you to all of you for following me for this long. I don’t deserve any of you, but I’m so grateful for all of you! If any of you need someone to talk to, I’ll be here.

Now, for the celebration part. I will be answering asks as best as I can (there are obviously some questions that I can’t/won’t answer). So, if anyone wants to send an ask, go ahead :)

Thank you all so much again!!!!!!

You all are amazing! Don’t doubt that💙💚❤

blog.name: ao3feed-stony
blog.title: Tony Stark/Steve Rogers
blog.description: stony ao3 fan fic rss feed

title: With you I feel whole
body:
by MaryBarrens

„Políbil mě,“ řekne Tony tiše. „Steve. Políbil mě.“

Bucky pár vteřin neřekne ani slovo, jako by ho vůbec neslyšel. „Dobře,“ řekne potom jemně, jeho hlas dokonale klidný.

Words: 6973, Chapters: 1/1, Language: Čeština

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Captain America (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M, Multi
  • Characters: Tony Stark, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Steve Rogers, Howard Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes, Edwin Jarvis, Ho Yinsen, Nick Fury, Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Sam Wilson (Marvel)

blog.title: Tony Stark/Steve Rogers
blog.description: stony ao3 fan fic rss feed

title: Miscommunication Is Key
body:
by deanshipsdestiel

“Rogers?” Fury says, and Steve blinks back to reality.

“Yes, sir?”

“You with us?”

Steve nods. “Of course. Where were we?”

“The gay bar,” Fury answers.

“Ah, right,” Steve says. “The gay bar.”

title: Perdiéndolo todo
body:
by YokoHasagagua

Por una mala decisión puedes pasar de tenerlo todo a no tener nada

Steve Rogers una vez lo tuvo todo. Un esposo, familia, amigos, un hogar. Ahora lo ha perdido todo.

‘No valió la pena’

title: Small scares (and Worst nightmares)
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2WPW8aZ

by Waywardgoose

Tony doesn’t like to wear his fears on his sleeve, but neither does the dumbass witch he acidentally adopted.
Apparently, they have more in common than he’d realised.

(Or: Pepper left for five minutes and it all goes to hell)

blog.name: marvelheroesassemble
blog.title: Marvel Your Universe
blog.description:
Will

Big huge and die hard Marvel fan.

Love all things Marvel and the MCU.

Love the Avengers.

Especially, the Original Six.

Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, the Hulk,

Black Widow and Hawkeye.

Robert Downey, Jr., Chris Evans,

Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo,

Scarlett Johansson and Jeremy Renner.

They’re my babies.

They hold a very special place in my heart.

All of them are legendary and iconic.

Love all the other heroes too.

Marvel is my Inspiration and my home!

"Avengers Assemble"
